channel.title: Help me get on a server please
channel.description: hi, i'm really new to this whole "moparscape" thing, and i need some help. i apologize in advance if i am breaking the forum rules, but i'm getting a little impatient. i've been on this website all day trying to download a server, but i keep failing. i don't know much about computers or programing, so please be specific with your instructions. also, i have a mac if that helps (i'm sure it does lol). thanks for the help!

item.title: Help me get on a server please
item.dc:creator: @Mishots Mishots
item.description:
@Mishots wrote:

the reason why ur probably disconnecting is either the owner is compiling or updating, or internet connection is weak, there could be a custom client made for that server. so when ever your checking servers on server status page make sure to check if they posted a custom client or not.

Read full topic
item.source: Help me get on a server please

item.title: Help me get on a server please
item.dc:creator: @racialslur racialslur
item.description:
@racialslur wrote:

ok, update. i did find a server =) i can log on and walk around for about 10 seconds, then it logs off. i see other people there, walking and talking, so i know i was there for sure. is there something wrong with my computer, or do i need to download something else?

Read full topic
item.source: Help me get on a server please

item.title: Help me get on a server please
item.dc:creator: @Mishots Mishots
item.description:
@Mishots wrote:

ok. open the client you downloaded wait for it to load then click file and click on new server. type in the servers ip that you saw on the server status page. then put in a random user name and pass and you should log in. if not then that server is off and try and diffrent one.

Read full topic
item.source: Help me get on a server please

item.title: Help me get on a server please

item.description:
@racialslur wrote:

i’m not sure, but it says at the top “moparscape 3.2 w/aryan”

Read full topic

item.title: Help me get on a server please
item.dc:creator: @racialslur racialslur
item.description:
@racialslur wrote:

ok i think i downloaded something, and i tried copying the ip, and i almost got something! it just won’t completely log me in, and it’l say something like “use a different world” or “the server is down” (and the site says the server is up 100% of the time). any more help?

Read full topic
item.source: Help me get on a server please

item.title: Help me get on a server please
item.dc:creator: @Mishots Mishots
item.description:
@Mishots wrote:

download silab soft client or use mopars client. go to any server status page copy down the server ip and type in in the client and your on.

Read full topic
